title: Vehicle Target Identification
description: An analyst must use drone full-motion video (FMV) to positively identify a specific vehicle in a convoy believed to be carrying a high-value individual (HVI).

tasks.description: Analyze the live FMV feed to locate the convoy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully finds the convoy in the video feed.

tasks.description: Compare vehicles in the convoy against intelligence descriptions to find the target vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the specific vehicle based on features like make, model, and markings.

tasks.description: Maintain a continuous track on the identified vehicle and report any changes in its status or behavior.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully tracks the vehicle without losing sight.
